Community Service Society of New York

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Old Mens Toy Shop Album -- Wild and Tame Animal Chests for the Kiddies

mods:mods.mods:abstract: Annotation on back: From: Old Mens Toy Shop Album. 133 lines.

Description: #4188 From: Old Men's Toy Shop Album Unknown Photographer Used as illustration for Crawford Shops Ad on back cover of Bagdad On the Subway; A Periodical of Association [AICP] News, September 1919, No. 7. Heading: WILD AND TAME ANIMAL CHESTS FOR THE KIDDIES Addresses given in Ad: Shops: 505 East 16 St. Store: 28 West 51 St. Used as illustration for Crawford Shops Ad on inside of front cover of Bagdad On the Subway, November 1919, No. 8. Heading: A BOX OF HAPPINESS FOR THE KIDDIES Address for Crawford Shops as above. No address for store.) Used as illustration for Crawford Shops Ad in Bagdad On the Subway, December 1919, No. 9, page l6. Heading: A BOX OF CHRISTMAS HAPPINESS FOR CHILDREN (Address for Crawford Shops as above. No store address.)

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: New York Association for Improving the Condition of the Poor, Bagdad on the Subway 7 (New York: 1919); New York Association for Improving the Condition of the Poor, Bagdad on the Subway 8 (New York: 1919); New York Association for Improving the Condition of the Poor, Bagdad on the Subway 9 (New york: 1919).
